Race.SpecificTitle: Council Member -- District 4, City of Westwego

Race.FullText: Shall the Parish School Board of the Parish of Jefferson, Louisiana, be authorized to continue to levy and collect, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2015 and ending with the year 2024, an ad valorem tax of seven (7) mills on all property subject to taxation in the Parish of Jefferson (an estimated $23,238,756 reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the tax for an entire year), for the purpose of paying costs of operating and maintaining the public school system in the Parish?

Race.SpecificTitle: Cons. Waterworks Dist. #1 -- 5 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated Waterworks District No. 1 of the Parish of Jefferson, Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to continue the levy and collection of a tax of five (5) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $14,842,232, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating waterworks facilities in the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Cons. Sewerage Dist. #1 -- 5 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Consolidated Sewerage District No. 1 of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to continue the levy and collection of a tax of five (5) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2013, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $12,306,043, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining and operating sewerage works and facilities within and for the District?

Race.SpecificTitle: Fire Protection Dist. #5 -- 20 Mills - PC - 10 Yrs.
Race.FullText: Shall Fire Protection District No. 5 of the Parish of Jefferson, State of Louisiana (the "District") be authorized to continue the levy and collection of a tax of twenty (20) mills on the dollar on all property subject to taxation in the District, for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the year 2014, with the estimated amount reasonably expected to be collected from the levy of the tax for one year being $3,356,908, for the purpose of acquiring, constructing, improving, maintaining or operating fire protection facilities, vehicles and equipment, including both movable and immovable property to be used to provide fire protection service in the District?
